heroes.lore: Hwasa is Oblivion, the 8th deadly sin. Unlike other sins, Oblivion does not tempt mortals with indulgence, but devour their past, stripping them of identity, history, and purpose. Hwasa is a spirit that shapeshifts into her opponents, assuming their identities to bewilder enemies and seize victory.

Bjorak is the titan guardian of the frozen north, sworn to protect the ice lands like an immovable glacier. To go against Bjorak is to go against the winter itself: the bitter cold of his enchanted shield seeps into his foes, slowing their movement until entombed in frost.

When the first warflame ignited, Gaia emerged from clay, twigs and ashes, destined to protect nature from destruction. She molded mountains into golems and trees into thorns, halting conflict not through vengeance, but self-defense, for nature does not hate â€” it simply endures.

Once a guardian of his nomadic tribe, betrayal forced Szahir into exile, turning him into a relentless predator. Guided only by the sun and the hunt, Szahir roams the sands seeking vengeance against those who wronged him: by imbuing his arrows with the essence of the desert, he blinds, steals and executes his foes.
